long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Markbook is the easiest and most efficient way to manage and use your bookmarks. With Markbook, your bookmarks finally come to life. Markbook offers the following features:

Free and Private: Enjoy Markbook and keep your bookmarks private, free of charge, for ever.

Local-First Application: Markbook does not require an online account, ensuring that your data remains under your control.

Cross-Device and Browser Compatibility: Access and manage your bookmarks across multiple devices and browsers while maintaining complete privacy. Markbook secures your data with end-to-end encryption.*

Advanced Search: Effortlessly locate any bookmark or history item with our built-in search tool.

Customizable Bookmark Options: Tailor the way each of your bookmarks opens, whether in a private tab, pinned tab, or another format.

Shortmarks: Experience the convenience of Markbooks' "Shortmarks™," smart bookmarks that automatically expire.

Tab Management: Eliminate tab clutter and reduce memory usage by up to 95%. Save, recall, and share entire windows (including private!) with just a few clicks.

Visual Bookmark Identification: Identify bookmarks by an image of their webpage using Markbook’s tab images.

One-Click Bookmark Management: Have dedicated lists for bookmarks, favorites, shortmarks, tab groups, and history, accessible with a single click.

Enhanced History Features: Benefit from enhanced history management, including integrated private history and tab activity.*

Custom Web Search Integration: Use the integrated custom web search to search directly within YouTube, Wikipedia, and many more.

Sharing: Share your bookmarks with as many people as you like, while maintaining control over what you share and with whom.

Privacy Commitment: Your privacy is one of our top priorities. Besides using E2EE, we never analyze or sell your data.


* Some features require a Markbook Pro subscription.
